00021 #ifndef __PARSE_H
00022 #define __PARSE_H
00023 
00024 /* Parser state */
00025 struct stream
00026 {
00027         unsigned char *p;
00028         unsigned char *end;
00029         unsigned char *data;
00030         unsigned int size;
00031 
00032         /* Offsets of various headers */
00033         unsigned char *iso_hdr;
00034         unsigned char *mcs_hdr;
00035         unsigned char *sec_hdr;
00036         unsigned char *rdp_hdr;
00037         unsigned char *channel_hdr;
00038 
00039 };
00040 typedef struct stream * STREAM;
00041 
00042 #define s_push_layer(s,h,n)     { (s)->h = (s)->p; (s)->p += n; }
00043 #define s_pop_layer(s,h)        (s)->p = (s)->h;
00044 #define s_mark_end(s)           (s)->end = (s)->p;
00045 #define s_check(s)              ((s)->p <= (s)->end)
00046 #define s_check_rem(s,n)        ((s)->p + n <= (s)->end)
00047 #define s_check_end(s)          ((s)->p == (s)->end)
00048 
00049 #if defined(L_ENDIAN) && !defined(NEED_ALIGN)
00050 #define in_uint16_le(s,v)       { v = *(uint16 *)((s)->p); (s)->p += 2; }
00051 #define in_uint32_le(s,v)       { v = *(uint32 *)((s)->p); (s)->p += 4; }
00052 #define out_uint16_le(s,v)      { *(uint16 *)((s)->p) = v; (s)->p += 2; }
00053 #define out_uint32_le(s,v)      { *(uint32 *)((s)->p) = v; (s)->p += 4; }
00054 
00055 #else
00056 #define in_uint16_le(s,v)       { v = *((s)->p++); v += *((s)->p++) << 8; }
00057 #define in_uint32_le(s,v)       { in_uint16_le(s,v) \
00058                                 v += *((s)->p++) << 16; v += *((s)->p++) << 24; }
00059 #define out_uint16_le(s,v)      { *((s)->p++) = (v) & 0xff; *((s)->p++) = ((v) >> 8) & 0xff; }
00060 #define out_uint32_le(s,v)      { out_uint16_le(s, (v) & 0xffff); out_uint16_le(s, ((v) >> 16) & 0xffff); }
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #if defined(B_ENDIAN) && !defined(NEED_ALIGN)
00064 #define in_uint16_be(s,v)       { v = *(uint16 *)((s)->p); (s)->p += 2; }
00065 #define in_uint32_be(s,v)       { v = *(uint32 *)((s)->p); (s)->p += 4; }
00066 #define out_uint16_be(s,v)      { *(uint16 *)((s)->p) = v; (s)->p += 2; }
00067 #define out_uint32_be(s,v)      { *(uint32 *)((s)->p) = v; (s)->p += 4; }
00068 
00069 #define B_ENDIAN_PREFERRED
00070 #define in_uint16(s,v)          in_uint16_be(s,v)
00071 #define in_uint32(s,v)          in_uint32_be(s,v)
00072 #define out_uint16(s,v)         out_uint16_be(s,v)
00073 #define out_uint32(s,v)         out_uint32_be(s,v)
00074 
00075 #else
00076 #define in_uint16_be(s,v)       { v = *((s)->p++); next_be(s,v); }
00077 #define in_uint32_be(s,v)       { in_uint16_be(s,v); next_be(s,v); next_be(s,v); }
00078 #define out_uint16_be(s,v)      { *((s)->p++) = ((v) >> 8) & 0xff; *((s)->p++) = (v) & 0xff; }
00079 #define out_uint32_be(s,v)      { out_uint16_be(s, ((v) >> 16) & 0xffff); out_uint16_be(s, (v) & 0xffff); }
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #ifndef B_ENDIAN_PREFERRED
00083 #define in_uint16(s,v)          in_uint16_le(s,v)
00084 #define in_uint32(s,v)          in_uint32_le(s,v)
00085 #define out_uint16(s,v)         out_uint16_le(s,v)
00086 #define out_uint32(s,v)         out_uint32_le(s,v)
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 #define in_uint8(s,v)           v = *((s)->p++);
00090 #define in_uint8p(s,v,n)        { v = (s)->p; (s)->p += n; }
00091 #define in_uint8a(s,v,n)        { memcpy(v,(s)->p,n); (s)->p += n; }
00092 #define in_uint8s(s,n)          (s)->p += n;
00093 #define out_uint8(s,v)          *((s)->p++) = v;
00094 #define out_uint8p(s,v,n)       { memcpy((s)->p,v,n); (s)->p += n; }
00095 #define out_uint8a(s,v,n)       out_uint8p(s,v,n);
00096 #define out_uint8s(s,n)         { memset((s)->p,0,n); (s)->p += n; }
00097 
00098 #define next_be(s,v)            v = ((v) << 8) + *((s)->p++);
00099 
00100 #endif // __PARSE_H
